runs.comm: good length and straight first up, Warner stays in his crease, gets squared up a touch and defends
good length on a similar line, going across the left-hander, Warner taps the ball on the leg side
a touch shorter and on leg stump, Warner moves back and across and taps the ball through square leg, the batsmen run hard and take two on this large outfield
pushed off the back foot once again through square leg, this delivery came back into Warner off the pitch
Finch pushes with hard hands at a ball that pitches on a length outside off, hits it uppishly but bounces well short of the fielder at cover point
width outside off stump and Finch tries to blaze the ball through the off side, he gets a thick outside edge which carries the ball high over the head of the only slip catcher
Vinay is massively lucky to escape there, he began with a leg-stump full toss and Warner mis-timed the whip behind square. Finch sets off quickly and steals the single
too full and straight, Finch stays on his crease and tees off, lifting the ball over midwicket and to the boundary
width offered outside off and this time Finch middles the cut, he doesn't beat cover point through
tapped off the back foot close on the leg side for a quick single
he's lucky again, Vinay sprayed this one far down leg side, Dhoni had to dive full length to his right to prevent five wides
short of a length outside off, Warner defends on the back foot on the off side
not so lucky this time is Vinay, Warner attempts to whip the ball off his pads through midwicket but eventually places it wide of the fielder at short fine leg, poor line from the bowler
cut off the back foot through backward point

caught at deep square leg! Warner took on Praveen, trying to pull off the front foot and clear what is a huge boundary. He didn't make proper contact and sent the ball soaring. Gambhir back-pedaled to get into position and judged the catch well a few yards in from the boundary
played off the back foot on the leg side
full and straight, Marsh pushes off the front foot towards midwicket

edged and juggled once, juggled twice and finally caught! Marsh pushes forward at a delivery that slants across him and edges to Virender Sehwag's left at first slip. Sehwag fumbles on the first attempt and tumbles, as he tumbles he reaches out to tap the ball further in the air, so Dhoni, who moved to his left, can take the catch
David Hussey lets his first ball go close to off stump
length ball with width outside off, Finch cuts to the fielder at point
Vinay hits a good length, drawing Finch into the front-foot drive, and then nips the ball away from the right-hander, beating the bat
short and wide outside off, Finch pounces, cutting the ball with power through point, poor ball
wide outside off again, this time the length is fuller so Finch square drives and opens the face to guide towards third man
there's room to cut from Vinay and Finch does so, hitting the ball crisply towards third man
David Hussey's let his second ball go through to the keeper as well
Praveen strays down leg side, Finch misses the glance
Finch tries to cut one that's outside of and bottom-edges it into the ground
Finch moves across to flick and gets an inside edge on to pad as the ball goes towards square leg, there was a small appeal for lbw from Praveen
played off the back foot on the off side
short and wide outside off and Finch smashes it, smashes it off the front foot, with his back leg bent, and a full swing of his bat, lovely square cut
so the length is fuller outside off now and Finch moves forward and drives with power into the gap between cover and mid-off, the boundary is huge but the timing is good
punched off the back foot towards wide mid-off, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but the running was too swift
good length and straight, no width this time so Finch gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
pushed towards mid-on for a single
Hussey tries to cut but fails to connect, he hasn't put bat on ball yet
now he charges, makes room and swings wildly at a length ball outside off. No contact once again. That's four out of four.
five out of five. Hussey stays in his crease and prods at a good length ball that pitches around off and seams away from the right hander. Top stuff from the bowler.
Hussey gets going by playing the ball off the back foot behind point, first time he's hit it this evening
a little width outside off and Finch waits in his crease and dabs to third man
played back to the bowler
full ball around off or just outside, driven off the front foot through extra cover
Kohli bowls a friendly full toss on the stumps, Finch made room by moving towards leg and smashed the ball through extra cover
driven to long-on for a single

Finch has been run out! By two yards. Hussey dabbed the ball towards backward point and set off, Finch responded quickly. Jadeja was quicker at point, running to his left, picking up cleanly, and firing the throw on the move back to Dhoni, who broke the stumps with Finch well short
Australia reach 50 after Hussey forces the ball to long on
cut off the back foot for a single
played back to the bowler
played towards short third man
sightly shorter from Jadeja, cut off the back foot to deep point
played off the back foot through cover point once again
an appeal for lbw as Hussey goes back to work the ball on the leg side, the ball hit him on the thigh so it was too high
played off the back foot towards midwicket

Jadeja again and another run out! Hussey cut the ball towards Jadeja's left at backward point. He didn't want to run for Jadeja had moved quickly and made a sliding save. Bailey, however, had run a long way down from the non-striker's end. Jadeja got to his feet quickly and threw to Rahul Sharma, who broke the stumps with Bailey not in the frame
a long hop, Hussey goes back and pulls the ball into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary, a poor ball to release the pressure
played to midwicket off the back foot
pushed towards long-on for a single
driven past the diving bowler towards long-on
driven off the front foot towards cover
is that a third run-out? No, it isn't. Wade's out-stretched dive saved him.
driven off the front foot towards long-on
Wade moves forward to drive one that angles into him towards deep point
that is a colossal hit from Hussey. He got under a full ball and swung with might, sending the ball over the bowler's head and several rows back beyond this large boundary
punched off the back foot towards cover, there's a throw at the non-striker's end and Ashwin doesn't collect, the backing up is poor too
played to long-on for a single
nudged off the front foot towards backward point
that's a quicker ball down leg side
driven to long on for another single
played to long on for another single
Wade heaves at the ball, sending it high towards deep midwicket where Gambhir fields
punched off the back foot through cover point
Wade drives but hits it towards the bowler, Hussey scrambles to get back to safety
that's gone a long, long way! Wade gets down on one knee and pulverises the flighted delivery over the deep square leg boundary
played to long off for a single
Hussey rotates strike with a push to long off
Wade drives the ball through estra cover to the fielder in the deep
quicker and straighter ball, defended by the batsman
played towards midwicket for one
another quicker ball that angles into the left-hander from round the wicket, punched off the back foot to point
driven past the diving fielder at cover
that's one of his soduku balls but the line is on the pads, worked behind square
driven towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
nudged off the pads off the front foot towards midwicket, Jadeja, who is the bowler, sprints after it
strays down leg side, that's a wide
played off the pads towards midwicket

caught and bowled! Hussey's popped one straight back to the bowler, one of the easier return chances Jadeja will take in his career. He slower the pace on the ball and it stopped on Hussey as he tried to drive on the leg side
Mitchell Marsh gets off the mark by driving to long-on
quicker ball, driven with power to mid-off
nudged off the front foot towards point
driven firmly but to the fielder at cover
Marsh goes back and plays the ball to long-on
Wade waits in his crease and opens the face to drive the ball between backward point and short third man
defended towards point
short ball outside off, Wade backs away to hit it hard but places it to the man at cover
played through cover this time to bring up the 100 for Australia
Wade moves back to cut the ball hard but gets a thick outside edge that goes between the keeper and short third man
quicker ball outside off, Wade is beaten on the cut
nudged off the front foot towards fine leg
good length and straight, Marsh defends on the leg side
Marsh tries to make room but can only drive the ball to backward point
pushed into the covers for a single
a full toss outside off stump and Marsh smashes it to the cover boundary with a flowing drive, poor ball with lots of width
driven towards mid-on
strays on to the pads this time and Marsh sweeps to fine leg
Wade makes room, gets down on one knee and sweeps in the air towards deep square leg, the boundary is so large they can take two even though the ball didn't go too far away from Gambhir
makes room and drives through cover for a single
defended back to the bowler
short ball, Wade moves back and pulls towards Praveen at deep backward square leg
edged and four! Marsh was coming forward and then stopped, he was moving towards leg and then stopped. He finally cut at a quicker ball and edged it past Dhoni to the third-man boundary

that is a lightning stumping from Dhoni. He collected the ball so close to the bails that he barely had to move to take them off, just a mere push forward. Marsh had stretched forward to drive on the off side and dragged his back foot out of his crease just a little
Lee goes back and dabs the ball on the leg side for a single
that's not short enough to pull and Wade mis-times it through square leg
Lee goes back and defends on the off side, he wants a single but is sent back by Wade, as Rahul Sharma runs to his left and fields
he starts with a slow bouncer from round the wicket, angling into Wade who leans back to steer towards third man but is beaten

a direct hit from cover and Wade's gone! The ball was full outside off, Wade drove it with power along the ground to Rohit Sharma, who was in the circle. He fielded cleanly and, seeing that Lee had sent Wade back, took his time, lined up the stumps and threw them down. Wade dived full length but it wasn't enough
edged and caught! McKay pokes at a good length ball that leaves the right-hander and Dhoni dives to his right to take a low catch
Hogg stays on his crease and steers the ball to backward point
played off the back foot towards cover
it ends with Hogg making room to a length ball and cutting hard, beating the fielder at backward point diving to his right, and the fielder at third man running to his left
Lee goes back to cut the ball from his stumps but gets an outside edge that goes between Dhoni at short third man, the length was a bit short
Lee makes room and pulls the ball to long-on
Hogg moved across his stumps to work the ball on the leg side but was trapped plumb by a fuller ball

worked off the pads through midwicket and the fourth run-out ends the innings. Raina came sprinting in from the deep, picked up the ball with one hand and threw accurately to Dhoni, who collected the ball over the bails and ran out Doherty
